resources.string: Brick Sim will basically be a brick in the middle of the screen that when you tap on it will expand then go back to normal, while having an audio track of a dog barking and a text that appears and goes up that says woof, more actions will be there if necessary.

Quick Audition is an app that allows for recording of auditions and that allows for quick edits to be made right after. This all in one app provides aspiring musicians and actors to make their auditions with a user friendly interface without the stress of a learning curve.
